name: Puzzle Party
description: During a game jam, Amid and Casandra work together to create Puzzle Party, a simple, playful sliding block puzzle game. After a lifechanging event prevents both of them from finishing the game, Amid returns years later to overhaul the graphics, finish the puzzles and gives the game connectivity to the internet causing strange occurrences to happen in the game. Now, Amid waits for new players to join his server and get to the bottom of the phenomena happening inside Puzzle Party.
